enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration is reserved for CS and CE majors only.

Prerequisite: Students must have completed EECS 203-0 & EECS 205-0, or obtain the permission of the instructor in order to register for this course.
title: MEAS EECS 346-0-20 Microprocessor System Design
